The Washington Post Fact Checker debunke: S. Rep. Sean Duffy regarding Huma Abedin's ties to the Muslim Brotherhood.
Duffy: s office could only provide a New York Post column that did not directly allege any ties between Abedin and the Muslim Brotherhood as evidence for the claim.
CNN news report debunked the claim made: 4. The Muslim Brotherhood has never appeared on the U.S. State Department's list of terrorist organizations, although it has been designated as such by Egypt and other countries.
